reviewText: I have seen Defenseless MANY times, and although it had been a while since the last time, it was obvious that the film had been edited (butchered would be a better description). I contacted the company, and was told that they would alter the description in the listing (since no one there had actually viewed it!), but did not offer a refund. Thankfully Amazon has great customer service and cares about their customers, as they ended up reimbursing me.
